about_the_game:
Slide 'Em Up! is a puzzle game where you slide along a grid, assassinating guards to get to the exit! Game is currently a demo that includes 9 puzzles that showcase different mechanics and features of the game. The full game should be released sometime in early 2023!

Demo Includes:

9 puzzles
3 different worlds
Multiple Enemy and Block Types

How to play:

Slide around the grid using arrow keys or WASD
Destroy all the enemies and get to the exit!
If you're fighting a boss, all you need to do is destroy the boss. That's it!
Other Controls:

Z to Undo, R to restart level, Esc to Pause game and get options (including closing game, toggling sound, etc.)
